text: Réginald Arthur Villiers Forbes (18 November 1865 - 20 February 1952) was a British tennis playerDB 4 Tennis at the end of the 19th century. He won the French Open mixed doubles Championship with Yvonne Prévost in 1902 and 1903 when it was open only to French nationals or members of specific French clubs.French Open mixed doubles winners He died in Dinard. ==References== ==External links== * French Open mixed doubles winners Category:1865 births Category:1952 deaths Category:British male tennis players Category:French Championships (tennis) champions Category:Place of birth missing
title: Réginald Forbes
